title: Thai vegetable stir fry with coriander rice
ingredients: ['2 (250g) packs Tilda Lime and Coriander Steamed Basmati Rice', '1 tablespoon veg oil', '250g button mushrooms, halved', '100g soya beans', '175g baby corn, halved', '1 red pepper, sliced into long strips', '2 tablespoons Thai green curry paste (60g)', '2 pak choi, sliced (235g)', '160ml can coconut cream', '2 teaspoons Thai fish sauce', '2 teaspoons toasted sesame seeds (optional)']
